paraphrase: int. 喂，你好（用于问候或打招呼）；喂，你好（打电话时的招呼语）；喂，你好（引起别人注意的招呼语）；<非正式>喂，嘿 (认为别人说了蠢话或分心)；<英，旧>嘿（表示惊讶）
n. 招呼，问候；（Hello）（法、印、美、俄）埃洛（人名）
v. 说（或大声说）“喂”；打招呼
sentence: You say "Hello" to someone when you meet them. 你好 (打招呼用语)
[套语]
Hello, Trish. I won't shake hands, because I'm filthy.

Hello is also a noun. 招呼
N-COUNT
The salesperson greeted me with a warm hello.
那位推销员向我打了个热情的招呼。
You say "Hello" to someone at the beginning of a telephone conversation, either when you answer the phone or before you give your name or say why you are phoning. 喂 (打电话时的招呼语)
[套语]
A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
一会儿之后，科恩拿起电话。“喂？”
You can call "hello" to attract someone's attention. 喂 (用于唤起别人注意)
CONVENTION
Very softly, she called out: "Hello? Who's there?"
她很轻柔地喊道：“喂？谁在那儿？”

V-T
He was afraid the dog's hairs might dirty the seats.
他担心狗毛会把座椅弄脏。
If someone gives you a dirty look, they look at you in a way which shows that they are angry with you. 怒视
[非正式]
Jack was being a real pain. Michael gave him a dirty look and walked out.
杰克真是个讨厌的人。迈克尔厌恶地看了他一眼，然后走了出去。
To do someone's dirty work means to do a task for them that is dishonest or unpleasant and which they do not want to do themselves. 替…干卑鄙的勾当; 为…干难对付的活
PHRASE
As a member of an elite army hit squad, the army would send us out to do their dirty work for them.
身为精锐突击队的成员，部队会派我们去执行艰难的任务。
If you say that an expression is a dirty word in a particular group of people, you mean it refers to an idea that they strongly dislike or disagree with. 非常难听的词; 禁忌字眼
PHRASE
Marketing became a dirty word at the company.
“营销”成了该公司的禁忌字眼。

If you say that someone airs their dirty laundry in public, you disapprove of their discussing or arguing about unpleasant or private things in front of other people. There are several other forms of this expression, for example wash your dirty linen in public, or wash your dirty laundry in public. 家丑外扬
[表不满]
The captain refuses to air the team's dirty laundry in public.
队长拒绝把球队的丑事暴露在公众面前。
Prepend adds members to the beginning of the list.
Prepend将成员添加到列表的开头。
For aesthetic purposes, I prepend a tag to the inventory item.
出于美观的目的，我在库存项前加上标记。
To do this, we prepend as_ at the beginning of the database name.
要实现这一点，可以在数据库名称的开头附上as _ at。

这本书旨在使药物治疗简单化。
a solemn supplication, esp in a form of ceremony prescribed by the Church 祷告; 尤指按照教堂礼仪做的祷告或祈祷
